Tucson nodds.

"Thank you Legacy, everyone, I know it's hard to understand =
things that we normally could never understand, but it is this common groun=
d which will keep us together as a faction, something Hydras does not have,=
 nor will ever have.  I also understand your reservations on the matter.  I=
 can tell just by the tones of your voices, but I also comprehend the reaso=
n behind it and it's only normal to have reservations.  I am not offended b=
y your true feelings, but thankful you are willing to give Perceptor the ch=
ance to prove himself worthy."

Before Tucson had been upgraded to a Prime,=
 this sort of talk would often anger him to the point of grave annoyance.  =
He'd often speak up and stick up for those being riddiculed and whenever ne=
cesary, he probably would have lost his temper all together and decked the =
offender right there and then.  But now, he realizes those feelings did not=
 come through.  Something was definitely changing.  Instead of being his ol=
d self, he was evolving into someone new, wiser, more tolerant, and a lot m=
ore calm as an individual.  Yet, his toughness was still there, along with =
his courage, and will to fight.  He could not yet understand the meaning of=
 these changes, and for whatever reason, he knew they were for the better. =
 He now turns his head in Legacy's direction.

" Even as a Prime, I'm still=
 in the process of learning.  I don't think I'll ever stop learning.  One t=
hing I have to admit, if I were still my old self now, short tempered, quic=
k to be critical, I may have blown the roof off the Ark, and retorted adver=
sely.  But now, I couldn't find it in my spark to react as such.  I'm chang=
ing, and as I change, I can feel the pressense of Optimus Prime.  I often f=
eel that if I could see my shadow, it would appear as his once did, long ag=
o.  Why is that?  I know I'm not Optimus, yet there is a part of me that fe=
els that he's within me somehow. Legacy, is there something about me that e=
ven I do not know?  I'm very curious to find out."

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogrou=
